description: Episode of Series "Mirror of Germany. The German Scene = Deutschland Spiegel". Magazine items include: the integration of young foreigners, a Hamburg artists' workshop, German inventor, Rudolf Diesel, the veterinary college in Hannover, Salzgitter, the Benedictine Abbey in the Rhineland, a soccer match between Germany and North Ireland.
